verses.verse: Return, <S%H7725><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> For you have stumbled <S%H3782><s%> because of your iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> with you and return <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> to Him, "Take <S%H5375><s%> away all <S%H3605><s%> iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> And receive <S%H3947><s%> [us] graciously, <S%H9185><s%> That we may present <S%H9608><s%> the fruit <S%H6499><s%> of our lips. <S%H8193><s%>

"Assyria <S%H804><s%> will not save <S%H3467><s%> us, We will not ride <S%H7392><s%> on horses; <S%H5483><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> will we say <S%H559><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> 'Our god, <S%H430><s%>' To the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands; <S%H3027><s%> For in Thee the orphan <S%H3490><s%> finds <S%H7355><s%> mercy. <S%H7355><s%>"
I will heal <S%H7495><s%> their apostasy, <S%H4878><s%> I will love <S%H157><s%> them freely, <S%H5071><s%> For My anger <S%H639><s%> has turned <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from them.

I will be like the dew <S%H2919><s%> to Israel; <S%H3478><s%> He will blossom <S%H6524><s%> like the lily, <S%H7799><s%> And he will take <S%H5221><s%> root <S%H8328><s%> like [the cedars of] Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

His shoots <S%H3127><s%> will sprout, <S%H1980><s%> And his beauty <S%H1935><s%> will be like the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree, <S%H2132><s%> And his fragrance <S%H7381><s%> like [the cedars of] Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

Those who live <S%H3427><s%> in his shadow <S%H6738><s%> Will again <S%H7725><s%> raise <S%H2421><s%> grain, <S%H1715><s%> And they will blossom <S%H6524><s%> like the vine. <S%H1612><s%> His renown <S%H2143><s%> [will be] like the wine <S%H3196><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

O Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> have I to do with idols <S%H6091><s%>? It is I who answer <S%H6030><s%> and look <S%H7789><s%> after you. I am like a luxuriant <S%H7488><s%> cypress; <S%H1265><s%> From Me comes <S%H4672><s%> your fruit. <S%H6529><s%>

Whoever <S%H4310><s%> is wise, <S%H2450><s%> let him understand <S%H995><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things; <S%H428><s%> [Whoever] is discerning, <S%H995><s%> let him know <S%H3045><s%> them. For the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> are right, <S%H3477><s%> And the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will walk <S%H1980><s%> in them, But transgressors <S%H6586><s%> will stumble <S%H3782><s%> in them.
